hero.heroDesc: ...who likes to craft solid and scalable frontend products with great user experiences.

profile.aboutText1: After graduating, I worked for 3 years in IT departments as a business analyst and process improvement specialist. I've always been deeply connected with the world of software, and creating something new has always been a passion of mine. This passion led me to pursue a career in frontend development.
profile.aboutText2: Now, I am advancing in this field by continuously improving myself and moving closer to my goals. Every challenge I encounter on this journey motivates me further and pushes me to become a better developer.

projectList.heading: Technological Pizza
projectList.desc: A simple and user-friendly website called 'Technological Meals,' where users can easily order food whenever they are hungry.

projectList.heading: Personal Website
projectList.desc: A small website where I introduce myself, showcase my skills and knowledge, and present the projects I have worked on.

footer.heading2: Got a question or proposal, or just want to say hello? Go ahead.
